name: fissile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
geology
  specialized (of rock) able to be divided easily into pieces: Because of its layered structure, mica is fissile.
physics
  specialized (of atoms) able to produce nuclear fission: An amount of fissile material was missing as a result of the accident.
